thread.title: Married at First Sight 2017: Alene blasted for making Simon get a haircut
thread.title_full: Married at First Sight 2017: Alene blasted for making Simon get a haircut

author: Bronte Coy
title: Married at First Sight 2017: Alene blasted for making Simon get a haircut
text:
MARRIED At First Sight bride Alene has received major backlash online after insisting on giving her new ‘husband’ Simon a full makeover on the show — including a dramatic haircut.
In a scene that surprised absolutely no one who saw Alene’s face when Simon first appeared in front of her with his mop of curly hair, the farmer finally succumbed to his fate last night and allowed a hairdresser to change his look .
But it was clear he wasn’t happy about it, and was suggesting a trim before his partner’s begging eventually won and he accepted defeat.
This about sums up Simon’s feelings toward the situation. Source: Channel 9
After the cut, Alene’s lukewarm attraction to Simon appeared to skyrocket, with the nurse gushing about how “hot” he looked, saying: “I can’t express how appreciative I am.”
It may have all appeared rosy on-screen, but fans on Twitter were quick to slam Alene for being so “shallow.”
Quote: : “Alene back off! You didn’t marry a good bloke to make him someone else — let him be and find someone who fits your shallow ideals.”
Others were a little softer in their approach.
“Simon you look great! And for the record. I thought you looked great with the curls too.”
Alene back off! You didn't marry a good bloke to make him someone else - let him be & find someone who fits your shallow ideals 😠 #9Married
— Kristy (@kristycarson) February 13, 2017 Alene...you will lose a great guy like Simon if you don't stop micro managing him #9married
— de SPK HAUS (@susiepkmelb) February 13, 2017 "It's still the same me." He's not happy. Bit shallow, Alene. #9married
— Nurse Ratched (@esesesse) February 13, 2017 Aww poor Simon... he really doesn't want to cut his hair and he's being bullied into it... but I see her point, lol #9Married
— Shelley⚓ (@wheresshelly) February 13, 2017 However, there’s no doubt that whatever the method, the feedback on the actual makeover was overwhelmingly positive.
Simon looks amazing with that new hairstyle #9Married
— Bec Greenwood (@BekstaGreeny) February 13, 2017 Simon looks amazing with that new hairstyle #9Married
— Bec Greenwood (@BekstaGreeny) February 13, 2017 Simon looks amazing, he's gonna get a lot of attention 😍❤ #9Married #savejohn
— Caitlin (@caitlin1D03) February 13, 2017 Even Simon eventually admitted he didn’t mind his new look.
‘It’s still a bit out of my comfort zone, but it’s a nice change,’ he said.
Even Simon knows he looks good. Source: Channel 9
